name: Andrew Paulausky
text: The food is so hot and fresh and the bread is perfect.  There is nothing like the pizza hut pizza every where in the country.   The wings are such a great compliment.  And even the leftovers are amazing.

text: I ordered my food online for delivery, the food was cold and had lent and hair on it. It didn’t taste good and the pizza was made sloppy. Due to COVID after seeing that lent and hair it was not safe to eat. I threw it a way and it was a waste of money.
